name: harbor-marks-subgraph
description: Subgraph for tracking Harbor Marks in Maiden Voyage

scripts.deploy:production: cp subgraph.production.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio harbor-marks
scripts.deploy:production:version: cp subgraph.production.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio harbor-marks --version-label
scripts.deploy:test: cp subgraph.test.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio harbor-marks-test
scripts.deploy:test:version: cp subgraph.test.yaml subgraph.yaml && graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio harbor-marks-test --version-label
scripts.use:local: cp subgraph.local.yaml subgraph.yaml 2>/dev/null || echo 'No local config found'
